hopobject.body:
The Beagle Breeds

Alternatives to the Digi-Key distributed OMAP3 Beagle Board

Because the Beagle Board is an open hardware project, it is only natural that derivative works that address various additional market needs would be born. This page attempts to summarize some of those alternatives.

OMAP3 Boards

The first place to look for alternatives is the list of OMAP3 boards on the TI OMAP wiki site.

Selection criteria

We are in the process of creating a comparison table and questionnaire. Below is the working list of questions:

  • What design and layout source available?
  • What volume and lead times options exist?
  • What commercial support sources available?
  • What are the distribution options and localities?
  • What are the additional interfaces and expansion options?
  • What interfaces removed or changed?
